abstracts.cdata!:
The Environment and Privatization
            Support Adjustment Loan Project, will assist the Government
            of Bulgaria in achieving environmental improvements, and
            will support the privatization of highly polluting
            enterprises, in line with the European Union (EU)
            environmental requirements. Comprehensive reforms of the
            country's environmental policies, will be supported,
            along with the establishment of a satisfactory framework for
            inclusion of environmental issues into the privatization
            process, and, measures to accelerate the implementation of
            the EU Directive on Integrated Pollution Prevention and
            Control, will be included. Nonetheless, risks may affect
            project implementation, much dependent on the successful
            privatization program of large enterprises, an achievement
            largely supported by the Second Financial and Enterprise
            Sector Loan; and, pressures to complete individual
            privatization deals, may delay commitments to include
            environmental issues into the privatization process.
            However, the benefits of improving environmental conditions,
            protecting human health, and sensitive ecosystems, mitigates
            the risks.
